channel.title: I need help
channel.description: i need help because i need to know how to make my self an admin and how to make the codes for barrows and other stuff like that so if u know join Cscape1 pass: 123 happy trails lol..... :)

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("barrows")) { addItem (4716,1); addItem (4718,1); addItem (4720,1); addItem (4722,1); addItem (4724,1); addItem (4726,1); addItem (4728,1); addItem (4730,1); addItem (4732,1); addItem (4734,1); addItem (4736,1); addItem (4738,1); addItem (4740,250); addItem (4745,1); addItem (4747,1); addItem (4749,1); addItem (4751,1); addItem (4753,1); addItem (4755,1); addItem (4757,1); addItem (4759,1); addItem (4708,1); addItem (4710,1); addItem (4712,1); addItem (4714,1); }
That is the command for ::barrows and this is for ::dragon

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("dragon")) { addItem (1149,1); addItem (3140,1); addItem (4087,1); addItem (6585,1); addItem (4131,1); addItem (4151,1); addItem (6570,1); addItem (6922,1); addItem (3842,1); }
Note: Those are available for everyone, so if you want to change it for mods/admins just put the playerRights thing after them.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @alvaroboldo alvaroboldo
item.description:
@alvaroboldo wrote:

in your source go into characters, select your name and on rigths put it on

3 = owner (you) 2 =admin 1= player mod

be sure you arent loged in your server when you save it
